content: this is a free crochet pattern to help you create an adorable soot sprite amigurumi soot sprites are little fuzzy black creatures a bit like dust bunnies made famous in the studio ghibli films *my neighbor totoro* and *spirited away* it s so fast to work up don t be surprised if you end up with many soot sprites somehow wandering through your hallways p ****************************** **level ** easy **size ** 3in/8cm wide by 3in/8cm tall **yarn ** fun fur yarn or eyelash yarn acrylic worsted weight yarn **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet decrease ******************************** i d love to see how your projects turn out let me know what creative way you ended up using your soot sprites for be sure to tag me with your projects on my instagram 1 or facebook 2 you can also subscribe to my youtube channel 3 to get all the latest video tutorials happy crocheting 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan 3 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
